#278 0' 2.5"
22.05 lbs. 		Cocoon Pokémon It remains virtually immobile while it clings to a tree. However, on the inside, it busily prepares for evolution. This is evident from how hot its shell becomes.

By Disc

Disc Ability Score Description
Disc 09 Swarm 5 Powers up Bug-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.
Disc 11 Ball Fetch 1 If the Pokémon is not holding an item, it will fetch the first failed thrown Poké Ball.
Disc 16 Lifelink 7 The Pokémon may restore some of its HP after making contact.
Disc 23 Frostproof 6 The Pokémon resists Ice-type moves and damage from frostbite.
Disc 38 Compound Eyes 8 The Pokémon's compound eyes boost its accuracy.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By tutoring

Ability Score Description
Anticipation 3 The Pokémon can sense an opposing Pokémon's dangerous moves.
Cold-Blooded 6 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in harsh sunlight.
Defeatist -2 Halves the Pokémon's Attack and Sp. Atk stats when its HP becomes half or less.
Effect Spore 7 Contact with the Pokémon may inflict poison, sleep, or paralysis on its attacker.
Fumigate 8 Normal-type moves become Poison-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Gluttony 3 Makes the Pokémon already eat a held Berry when its HP drops to half or less.
Harvest 7 May create another Berry after one is used.
Klutz -2 The Pokémon can't use any held items.
Poison Touch 6 May poison a target when the Pokémon makes contact.
Run Away 1 Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.
Sap Sipper 7 Boosts the Attack stat if hit by a Grass-type move instead of taking damage.
Shield Dust 7 This Pokémon's dust blocks the additional effects of attacks taken.
Simple 8 The stat changes the Pokémon receives are doubled.
Slow Start -5 For five turns, the Pokémon's Attack and Speed stats are halved.
Stall -2 The Pokémon moves after all other Pokémon do.
Symbiosis 3 The Pokémon passes its item to an ally that has used up an item.
Truant -5 The Pokémon can't use a move if it had used a move on the previous turn.
Shed Skin 8 The Pokémon may heal its own status conditions by shedding its skin.
Weak Armor 4 Physical attacks to the Pokémon lower its Defense stat but sharply raise its Speed stat.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled
